channel.title: Wild Zone but still says Safe
channel.description: I had some weird glitch on my server, it says 'Safe' Even when you are in the wild, and I honestly do not know what happened... I Deleted all of my safe zone's, and it still said safe, so I put them back and went into the Wild and it said Safe, I made sure that my 'Y' Cords were under 3520 But, even in my Funpk it says Safe, but when you attack someone it reacts as if it was still Funpk. I have gone threw and were it says Wild for the Wild Zone, I have made sure it was still there and it is. Now, I am not the greatest coder but is there any way I can create a wild zone, and if so what would I search in my Client?

item.title: Wild Zone but still says Safe
item.dc:creator: @static_double_youras static double yourass_;
item.description:
@static_double_youras wrote:

Make sure the coordinates are stated in the checkwildy methods.

Read full topic
item.source: Wild Zone but still says Safe

item.title: Wild Zone but still says Safe
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

…

public void checkwild() { if((absX >= #### && absX <= ####)) return true; else return false; }
Something like that, but don’t use that. It won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Wild Zone but still says Safe
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

I had some weird glitch on my server, it says ‘Safe’ Even when you are in the wild, and I honestly do not know what happened… I Deleted all of my safe zone’s, and it still said safe, so I put them back and went into the Wild and it said Safe, I made sure that my ‘Y’ Cords were under 3520 But, even in my Funpk it says Safe, but when you attack someone it reacts as if it was still Funpk. I have gone threw and were it says Wild for the Wild Zone, I have made sure it was still there and it is. Now, I am not the greatest coder but is there any way I can create a wild zone, and if so what would I search in my Client?

Read full topic
item.source: Wild Zone but still says Safe
